        static boolean validateDatabaseInput(java.lang.String input)
        Parameters:
        input -
        Returns:

      • validateEmail

        static boolean validateEmail(java.lang.String emailStr)
        Parameters:
        emailStr -
        Returns:
        true if email is a valid (sensible) email format and email length is shorter than 40 characters
